title: Sandalwood Smoke, Manchuria
marks: Signature and Marks LRC, in pencil: [Paul Jacoulet]
description: woman lounging on front side over a covered pot emanating tendrils of smoke at LL; head resting on index finger of PR hand; wearing flowered robe, and flowers in hair
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by May McBride Guarisco
